help-file.title: "WANDERING WOODS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependant upon level of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Wandering Woods" can deceive and confuse when cast in a natural setting. It creates the illusion of surreal forest in the immediate area, causing anyone within its effects to lose their sense of direction.
